Today, under the guidance of the President of the State, we announce two historic projects in which we are entering a new era of development, progress and scientific development in our country.
Momani at the Hyatt Amman Hotel to sponsor the workshop / credibility of the Jordanian media http://t.co/LoFA9xQC9P
Sheikh Khalifa, may God preserve him and with the help of God and the success of the establishment of the Emirates Space Agency .. Our new goal will be entry into the space industry and space science
Our investments in satellite, satellite and other satellite programs exceed 20 billion dirhams and the Agency will make the sector part of our national economy
Over the coming years, we will be working on the development of Emirati human capital in space science ... and taking advantage of space technology to promote development in our country
We also announce today our project to send the first Arab and Islamic probe to Mars in 2021. Our goal is to make new knowledge contributions to mankind.
The probe will cut more than 60 million kilometers to bring us to the ranks of developed countries and begin to make new cultural contributions to the world
We want to build our knowledge capabilities, enter the world race to explore space, and build an Emirati person capable of achieving our great ambitions
When the Arab man has the right conditions, he can make real achievements, because this region is a region of civilizations and its ability to return to the industry of civilization and life
Today's figures show more people have the security of a job than ever before. Full employment is a key aim of our #LongTermEconomicPlan.

Today we announce two epic projects in our history: establishing UAE Space Agency and sending the first Arab spaceship to Mars by 2021
With investments already outstanding AED 20bn, the agency will maximize the contribution of space industries to the national economy
The more than 60M km journey to Mars will mark UAE as one of few countries with space programs to explore the Red Planet
Our region is a cradle of great civilizations. Given the right tools Arabs, once again, can deliver new scientific contributions to humanity

PM Netanyahu & DM Yaalon instructed IDF to commence ground action to strike at terrorist tunnels from the Gaza Strip into Israeli territory »
Hamas terrorists used such a tunnel to infiltrate into Israel today in order to perpetrate a large-scale attack against Israeli citizens. »
The IDF successfully thwarted this terrorist action. »
Prime Minister Netanyahu and Defense Minister Yaalon also instructed the IDF to be prepared for an expansion of the ground action. »
The directive for ground action was approved by the Security Cabinet after Israel agreed to the Egyptian ceasefire proposal, »
whereas Hamas rejected the cease fire proposal and continued firing rockets at Israeli cities. »
Hamas also did not honor the humanitarian ceasefire initiated by the UN and continued firing at Israeli cities during the lull. »
In light of Hamas' criminal & relentless aggression, and the dangerous infiltration attempt into Israel - Israel must defend its citizens »
Operation Protective Edge will continue until it reaches its goal - restoring quiet to Israel's citizens for a prolonged period, »
while inflicting a significant blow to the infrastructures of Hamas and the other terrorist organizations.
